ðŸ“– Summary: The focus-anchor repository provides a Chrome extension designed to improve readability and focus on web content. It allows users to highlight content at the sentence level with various styles and automatically scrolls to keep the focused sentence in view. This tool enhances productivity by minimizing distractions and promoting concentrated reading.
